languages.text: То, как непринужденно летун воспарил на потоках воздуха, говорит, что тело его должно быть очень легким. В полете ему, должно быть, приходится избегать даже мелких снарядов.

traits.locale_text: [DRAFT] Барк при успехе изучения места прыжка (зацепка для букэвента).

languages.text: The ease with which the flyer took to the air suggests that their body must be extremely light. Even small projectiles must pose a grave danger to them mid-air.
languages.original_text: То, как непринужденно летун воспарил на потоках воздуха, говорит, что тело его должно быть очень легким. В полете ему, должно быть, приходится избегать даже мелких снарядов.

traits.locale_text: The ease with which the flier took to the air suggests that their body must be extremely light. Even small projectiles must pose a grave danger to them during flight.
The ease with which the flier took to the air suggests that their body must be extremely light. Even small projectiles must pose a grave danger to them during flight.
The ease with which the flier took to the air suggests that their body must be extremely light. Even small projectiles must pose a grave danger to them mid-air.
The ease with which the flier took to the air suggests that their body must be extremely light. Even small projectiles must pose a grave danger to them mid-air.
The ease with which the flyer took to the air suggests that their body must be extremely light. Even small projectiles must pose a grave danger to them mid-air.
The ease with which the flyer took to the air suggests that their body must be extremely light. Even small projectiles must pose a grave danger to them mid-air.

languages.text: 簡単に空中に飛び立つところを見ると、彼らの体は非常に軽いのだろう。たとえ小さな発射体であっても、空中では致命的な危険をもたらすに違いない。
languages.original_text: The ease with which the flyer took to the air suggests that their body must be extremely light. Even small projectiles must pose a grave danger to them mid-air.

traits.locale_text: 簡単に空中に飛び立つところを見ると、彼らの体は非常に軽いのだろう。たとえ小さな発射体であっても、空中では致命的な危険をもたらすに違いない。

languages.text: 飞行者以极其轻松的动作在空中飞行，这说明飞行者的身体一定非常轻。因此，即便是很小的弹丸，也会对其构成严重威胁。
languages.original_text: The ease with which the flyer took to the air suggests that their body must be extremely light. Even small projectiles must pose a grave danger to them mid-air.

traits.locale_text: 飞行者以极其轻松的动作在空中飞行，这说明飞行者的身体一定非常轻。因此，即便是很小的弹丸，也会对其构成严重威胁。

languages.text: La facilidad con la que el aviador emprendió el vuelo sugiere que su cuerpo debe de ser extremadamente ligero. Incluso los proyectiles pequeños supondrán un grave peligro para él en pleno vuelo.
languages.original_text: The ease with which the flyer took to the air suggests that their body must be extremely light. Even small projectiles must pose a grave danger to them mid-air.

traits.locale_text: La facilidad con la que el aviador emprendió el vuelo sugiere que su cuerpo debe de ser extremadamente ligero. Incluso los proyectiles pequeños supondrán un grave peligro para él en pleno vuelo.

languages.text: Die Mühelosigkeit, mit der der Flieger abgehoben hat, lässt vermuten, dass sein Körper extrem leicht sein muss. Selbst kleine Projektile müssen in der Luft eine große Gefahr für ihn darstellen.
languages.original_text: The ease with which the flyer took to the air suggests that their body must be extremely light. Even small projectiles must pose a grave danger to them mid-air.

traits.locale_text: Die Mühelosigkeit, mit der der Flieger abgehoben hat, lässt vermuten, dass sein Körper extrem leicht sein muss. Selbst kleine Projektile müssen in der Luft eine große Gefahr für ihn darstellen.

languages.text: La facilité avec laquelle le pilote s'est envolé semble suggérer que son corps est extrêmement léger. Dans de telles conditions, recevoir le moindre projectile peut s'avérer fatal.
languages.original_text: The ease with which the flyer took to the air suggests that their body must be extremely light. Even small projectiles must pose a grave danger to them mid-air.

traits.locale_text: La facilité avec laquelle le pilote s'est envolé semble suggérer que son corps est extrêmement léger. Dans de telles conditions, recevoir le moindre projectile peut s'avérer fatal.

languages.text: Pilotun kalkış yaparkenki rahatlığı, bedenin oldukça hafif olduğunu gösteriyor. Havadayken en küçük mermi bile büyük hasar verebilir.
languages.original_text: The ease with which the flyer took to the air suggests that their body must be extremely light. Even small projectiles must pose a grave danger to them mid-air.

traits.locale_text: Uçucunun havaya yükselişindeki rahatlığı, bedenin oldukça hafif olduğunu gösteriyor. Havadayken küçük mermiler bile büyük hasarlar verebilir.
